Package controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddPart, ModifyPart, ModifyProduct
    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The controller for the main screen RUNTIME ERROR: Had trouble passing and pulling data to and from other classes. In almost all cases the issue was not matching the FXML(View) data with the data I was trying to pass to the controller which was giving me Nullvalue errors
